meta.title: Nuxt Dashboard Pro - Premium Template for Business Apps
meta.description: Professional Nuxt 3 template with modern UI, dark mode, TypeScript and accessible components. Launch your SaaS in days instead of months.

hero.title: Nuxt Dashboard Pro – The elegant and performant template for your business apps
hero.subtitle: Modern UI, accessible components, dark mode, responsive, easy customization – Ready to launch your SaaS or admin in days instead of months.

features.sectionDescription: Ready-to-use components to build your professional application quickly

dashboard.title: Complete Dashboard
dashboard.description: Modern admin interface with analytics, charts and KPIs.

auth.title: Authentication
auth.description: Complete system: login, register, reset password, email verification.

darkMode.title: Dark Mode
darkMode.description: Dark/light theme with smooth transitions and CSS customization.

dataTables.title: Data Tables
dataTables.description: Advanced tables with sorting, filtering, pagination and export.

responsive.title: Responsive
responsive.description: Perfect adaptive design on mobile, tablet and desktop.

performance.title: Performance
performance.description: Lighthouse 95+, optimized for speed and SEO.

demo.title: Try the Demo Now
demo.subtitle: Sign in with demo credentials to explore all features

components.sectionDescription: Library of reusable and customizable components
components.simpleModalDescription: This is a simple modal example with a title and description.
components.simpleModalContent: This is the content of the modal. You can add any content here.
components.simpleModalHint: Click the X button or press Escape to close the modal.
components.editProfileDescription: Make changes to your profile here.
components.name: Name

cta.title: Launch Your Project Today
cta.description: Save weeks of development with our professional template

components.title: Component Library
components.description: Browse and explore available UI components
components.buttonsDesc: Button component with multiple variants and sizes
components.tabsDesc: Accessible tab navigation component with icon support
components.tooltipsDesc: Contextual information on hover or focus with flexible positioning

form.title: Contact Form
form.description: Fill out the form below to get in touch with us
form.success: Your message has been sent successfully!
form.error: An error occurred. Please try again.
form.invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address

pricing.title: Business Operations Framework Pricing
pricing.subtitle: Business Operations Platform for Modern Teams. Choose the right plan for your needs.
pricing.footer: All licenses include lifetime updates and full source code access.

community.title: Community
community.description: Free for FOSS (Free and Open Source Software) projects only

login.title: Sign In
login.subtitle: Welcome back! Please enter your details.

validation.invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address
validation.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 8 characters
validation.passwordNoUppercase: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter
validation.passwordNoLowercase: Password must contain at least one lowercase letter
validation.passwordNoNumber: Password must contain at least one number

register.title: Create Account
register.subtitle: Get started with your free account.
register.name: Full Name
register.success: Account created! Please check your email to verify your account.

errors.termsNotAccepted: You must accept the terms and conditions

verifyEmail.title: Verify Email
verifyEmail.successMessage: Your email has been verified. You can now log in.
verifyEmail.errorMessage: The verification link is invalid or has expired.
verifyEmail.resendSuccess: Verification email sent! Please check your inbox.

forgotPassword.title: Forgot Password
forgotPassword.subtitle: Enter your email and we'll send you reset instructions.
forgotPassword.success: If an account exists with this email, you will receive a password reset link.
forgotPassword.checkEmail: Check your email for reset instructions

resetPassword.title: Reset Password
resetPassword.subtitle: Enter your new password below.
resetPassword.success: Password reset successful! You can now log in.

charts.title: Performance Trends
charts.description: View your key metrics over time

settings.title: Settings
settings.description: Manage your account settings and preferences

profile.title: Profile Information
profile.description: Update your personal information and profile picture
profile.photoHint: JPG, PNG or GIF. Max size 2MB.

profile.emailHint: Your email address cannot be changed
profile.bioHint: Brief description for your profile. Max 160 characters.

password.title: Change Password
password.description: Update your password to keep your account secure

twoFactor.title: Two-Factor Authentication
twoFactor.description: Add an extra layer of security to your account
twoFactor.statusDesc: Protect your account with two-factor authentication
